alert.note: Alert for Eastern, Central, and Southern Searcy County Higher Elevations; Marion; Newton County Lower Elevations; Northwest Searcy County Higher Elevations; Searcy County Lower Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 1:18AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Searcy, northeastern Newton and Marion Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 117 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lead Hill to Olvey to Jasper. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bull Shoals... Yellville... Flippin... Western Grove... Pyatt... Duff... Lakeway... Clark Hill... Maumee... Rush... Lion Hill... Dodd City... Bull Shoals State Park... Cotter... Summit... St. Joe... Pindall... Fairview in Marion County... Gilbert... Ralph... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
